scenarios.name: pktvisor bootstrap

steps.name: run pktvisor instance on port available with user permission
the pktvisor container status must be running
pktvisor API must be enabled
2 policies must be running

scenarios.name: run multiple pktvisors instances using different ports

steps.name: run pktvisor instance on port available with user permission
run pktvisor instance on port available with user permission
run pktvisor instance on port available with user permission
3 pktvisor's containers must be running

scenarios.name: run multiple pktvisors instances using the same port

steps.name: run pktvisor instance on port available with user permission
run pktvisor instance on port unavailable with user permission
1 pktvisor's containers must be running
1 pktvisor's containers must be exited

scenarios.name: create a policy with all handlers using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with all handler(s)
4 policies must be running

scenarios.name: create a policy with net handler using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with net handler(s)
4 policies must be running

scenarios.name: create a policy with dhcp handler using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with dhcp handler(s)
4 policies must be running

scenarios.name: create a policy with dns handler using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with dns handler(s)
4 policies must be running

scenarios.name: create a policy with pcap stats handler using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with pcap_stats handler(s)
4 policies must be running

scenarios.name: delete the default policy using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
delete 1 non-resource policies
0 policies must be running

scenarios.name: delete all non-resource policies using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with all handler(s)
delete 2 non-resource policies
0 policies must be running

scenarios.name: delete 1 non-resource policy using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with all handler(s)
delete 1 non-resource policies
2 policies must be running

scenarios.name: delete the default-resource policy using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
delete 1 resource policies
1 policies must be running

scenarios.name: delete all resource policies using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with all handler(s)
delete 2 resource policies
2 policies must be running

scenarios.name: delete 1 resource policy using admin permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with admin permission
create a new policy with all handler(s)
delete 1 resource policies
3 policies must be running

scenarios.name: create a policy using user permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with user permission
try to create a new policy with all handler(s)
status code returned on response must be 404
2 policies must be running

scenarios.name: delete 1 policy using user permission

steps.name: that a pktvisor instance is running on port available with user permission
try to delete a policy
status code returned on response must be 404
2 policies must be running
